column3: It would be nicer to find a comparable icon under a free license (CC Attribution isn't free IIRC)\n
Sheesh I searched half the internet for a non-(L)GPL icon (and free for both commercial and non-commercial use) and it's still not free enough for you.\n
LGPL and GPL are at least free... though I can see how GPL would be a problem for us.\n
Ok, I'll find a (L)GPL icon instead. No problem.\n
